greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of the number of partitions of n.
link: Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(7)=24 because the number of partitions of 7 is 15 and the sum of divisors of 15 is equal to 1 + 3 + 5 + 15 = 24.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 16 2008
